turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Plastic pollution.
turn.1: What was the impact of the Plastic Bag Ban?
turn.2: On the shore, thousands of birds corpses can be seen with plastic remaining where the stomach once was.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: The durability of the plastics is visible among the remains.
turn.5: What else do you find interesting?
turn.6: In some instances, the plastic piles are still present while the bird's corpse has decayed.
turn.7: Is there anything else I should know?
turn.8: Similar to humans, animals exposed to plasticizers can experience developmental defects.
turn.9: Do they have any other side effects?
turn.10: Specifically, sheep have been found to have lower birth weights when prenatally exposed to bisphenol A.
turn.11: Are there any other developmental issues?
turn.12: Exposure to BPA can shorten the distance between the eyes of a tadpole.
